title: Trump Should Resign Now, Says Larry Hogan
itunes:title: Trump Should Resign Now, Says Larry Hogan
description:
Republican Maryland Governor Larry Hogan discusses the events of this past week including the protesters who invaded the U.S. Capitol, his move to deploy the National Guard to assist the Capitol Police, and whether President Trump should resign or be impeached.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
